name: Universal Soldier
overview: Based on the major motion picture, this awesome action adventure takes you from the steaming shell-pocked jungles of Southeast Asia to laser-seared battlefields at home. You are a perfectly engineered Universal Soldier with extraordinary skills and powers - locked in mortal combat against your old Vietnam foe, the villainous Sergeant Scott. You are both "Ultimate Fighting Machines", but only one of you can survive! -Are you strong enough to conquer ten incredible locations? -Your arsenal includes Triple Beam Lasers, Land Mines and a special Chaos Weapon.
